data.title: Literature Reference: American Literature, English Literature, Classics & Modern Fiction
data.text:
Authors on Fiction

Adventure: Robert McCrum, Africa: Anthony Chennells, Australia & New Zealand: Jane Rogers, Black and white: Rita Christian, Canada: Aritha van Herk, Caribbean: E. A. Markham, Childhood: Jan Dalley, Classics: John Sutherland, Crime: Michael Dibdin, Family saga: Sherry Ashworth, Fantasy: Tom Shippey, Film adaptations: Mike Harris, France: Michèle Roberts, Germany: Michael Hulse, Glamour: Kate Saunders, Historical: Boyd Tonkin, Humour: Nigel Williams, India: Shirley Chew, Ireland: Patricia Craig…
